title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Driving AI Innovation at the Enterprise Level with MDB Atlas (DAT103)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 利用 MDB Atlas 在企业级推动 AI 创新 (DAT103)
abstract: Achieve breakthroughs in AI innovation with the right data foundation. MongoDB Atlas on AWS seamlessly unifies siloed enterprise data into an Operational Data Layer (ODL), making it actionable and secure. With built-in features like search, vector search, and VoyageAI-driven embeddings, Atlas accelerates the creation of AI solutions while removing complexity. Discover how businesses are driving transformation at scale with a streamlined approach to data and innovation. This presentation is brought to you by MongoDB, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 通过正确的数据基础实现AI创新突破。MongoDB Atlas on AWS无缝统一孤立的企业数据到操作数据层(ODL)，使其可操作且安全。凭借内置的搜索、向量搜索和VoyageAI驱动的嵌入等功能，Atlas加速AI解决方案的创建，同时消除复杂性。了解企业如何通过简化的数据和创新方法大规模推动转型。本演示由AWS合作伙伴MongoDB提供。
